clinical_history: Limb swelling, rule out deep venous thrombosis.
technique: Color Doppler and spectral analysis performed where necessary.
findings: No evidence of DVT; veins compressible with normal flow.
Fetal cardiac activity present with FHR 24.14 bpm.
Prostate is mildly heterogeneous; volume approximately 34.87 cc.
Liver appears hyperechoic with no focal lesions.
recommendations: Refer to specialist for further evaluation.
